name: LD 43
description:
Play as 'Red Shirt Guy' as you destroy thousands of 'Flesh Demons' in a clunky Twitch Ship.

Gain levels to upgrade your ship and face off against 'Corporate Greed', a demon made from the lust of money that is out of touch with the rest of the universe.

When the tribute time reaches 0 you will need to sacrifice an upgrade, but the gods will grant you with extra bullets and invincibility for a short while.

Made in 48hrs for Ludum Dare - Game Jam 43.

Controls:

  • WSAD - Move
  • LMB - Fire
  • RMB - Shield
  • Enter - Turn off sound

Note: Spacebar will reduce tribute timer to 0, this is allow you to see the boss without crushing through the game :).
